Ideahouse

A responsive, mobile-first site, tailor made for both Ideahouse's existing agents and prospective ones.

The existing site had been in operation for a number of years. Whilst we wanted to onboard new users (referred to from now on as agents), we were careful not to alientate the loyal and exiting base.

There are two articles accosiated with this project:

  1. Designing with Local Storage
  2. A practical use for CSS columns
